name: Learnit
tagline: The app to learn the words fast.
body:
# LearnIt

All the files in this work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/3.0/.

This Android app is used for learning foreign words fast. The method is quite simple - the app just forces you to keep track of the words you learn by showing you the notifications and not letting you to close them easily.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
